page.title: 10CHILBOLTON VILLAGE (3)
page.content: THERE ARE A NUMBER OF TRAVELLING TRADERS WHO CALL EACH WEEK;- FISHMONGER,GREEN-GROCER AND BAKER. SHOPS IN ANDOVER AND STOCKBRIGDE ALSO PROVIDE REGULAR DELIVERIES :-2 BUTCHERS,A NEWS-AGENT,LAUNDRY,BOTTLED GAS,AND COAL. MILK IS DELIVERED 5 TIMES A WEEK TO SOME HOUSES,3 TIMES A WEEK TO OTHERS. THERE ARE 3 HAIRDRESSERS WHO WORK IN CUSTOMERS OWN HOMES. 2 PEOPLE MAKE AND SELL WOODEN TOYS. A COMPANY USING THE OLD AIRFIELD SELLS AGRICULTURAL MACHINERY. DOCTORS ARE BASED IN STOCKBRIDGE,ANDOVER AND SUTTON SCOTNEY. A SURGERY IS HELD WEEKLY IN THE PUB,AND A MONTHLY BABY CLINIC IN THE VILLAGE HALL. PRESCRIPTIONS FROM STOCKBRIDGE ARE DELIVERED ONCE A WEEK. A CHIROPODIST VISITS ONCE A MONTH. HOSPITALS AND DENTISTS ARE IN ANDOVER AND WINCHESTER.
